subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has outlined serious rules violations at Southern Mississippi, finding multiple infractions by the men’s basketball program during the tenure of the former coach Donnie Tyndall.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has outlined serious rules violations at Southern Mississippi, finding multiple infractions by the men’s basketball program during the tenure of the former coach Donnie Tyndall.
